entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
